sentences: Wharton Tiers (born 1953, in Philadelphia) is an American audio engineer, record producer, drummer and percussionist.
Tiers started two groups which played his own compositions: A Band, which disbanded in 1980, and Glorious Strangers, which released a self-titled LP in 1984.
A new Ensemble LP, Freedom Now!, was released in March 2013 on Fun City NYC, a new record label founded by Tiers to release his music.
Theoretical Girls – You Got Me / U.S. Millie, 7", Theoretical Records, 1978.
Glenn Branca – Songs '77-'79, CD, 1996, Atavistic records.
Wharton Tiers - Mayan Nocturnes, Digital, Fun City NYC, 2013
Wharton Tiers - Political Sonatas, Digital, Fun City NYC, 2016
